# disposable interface

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/verse/disposable
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:35:05.126878

---

Implemented by classes whose instances have limited lifetimes.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/Verse }` |

## Members

This interface has functions, but no data members.

### Functions

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`Dispose`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/verse/disposable/dispose) | Cleans up this object. |
